tickets.name: TASK1
tickets.comment: use any string for the name

tickets.name: TASK2
tickets.comment: two other tasks can be worked in parallel with this task

tickets.name: TASK3
tickets.comment: a task can be anything and may involve multiple groups

tickets.name: TASK4
tickets.comment: parallelizable should not be more than team size

tickets.name: TASK5
tickets.comment: create as many tasks as you need

tickets.name: TASK6
tickets.comment: this task will take somewhere between 2 and 4 days

tickets.name: TASK7
tickets.comment: no other project work can be done in parallel with this task
